alert.note: Alert for Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 8:14AM MST until January 06 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Strong south winds to 35 mph will create blowing and drifting snow that will reduce visibility and worsen conditions on US-95 this morning. * WHERE...Camas Prairie, Grangeville and vicinity, and Greer Grade. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
